TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveAssemblyReference extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.TaskExtension

summary.span: 实现 ResolveAssemblyReference 任务。

span.span: Implements the ResolveAssemblyReference task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 ResolveAssemblyReference 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the ResolveAssemblyReference element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 [ResolveAssemblyReference 任务](/visualstudio/msbuild/resolveassemblyreference-task)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [ResolveAssemblyReference Task](/visualstudio/msbuild/resolveassemblyreference-task).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动处理最后生成的依赖项关系图，如同向 属性传递了 App.Config 文件一样。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the resulting dependency graph is automatically treated as if there were an App.Config file passed in to the property.

value.span: 如果生成的依赖项关系图自动被视为已传递到 属性的 app.config 文件，则为; 否则为。否则，。

span.span: if the resulting dependency graph is automatically treated as if there were an App.Config file passed in to the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. 有关此属性的详细信息，请参阅[ResolveAssemblyReference 任务](/visualstudio/msbuild/resolveassemblyreference-task)。For more information about this property, see [ResolveAssemblyReference Task](/visualstudio/msbuild/resolveassemblyreference-task).

summary.span: 获取或设置要用于搜索和解析过程的程序集列表（必须是绝对文件名或与项目相关的文件名）。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of assemblies, which must be absolute file names or project-relative file names, to use for the search and resolution process.

value.span: 要用于搜索和解析过程的程序集列表。

span.span: The list of assemblies to use for the search and resolution process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性包含 {CandidateAssemblyFiles} 作为要考虑的路径之一时，将会考虑此列表中的程序集。Assemblies in this list will be considered when the property contains {CandidateAssemblyFiles} as one of the paths to consider.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CopyLocalDependenciesWhenParentReferenceInGac { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值决定依赖项的确定方式以及是否仅在本地复制依赖项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how dependencies are determined, and whether or not a dependency is copied locally.

value.span: 如果在确定是否应在本地复制依赖项，则其中一项检查是查看项目文件中的父引用是否设置了 Private 元数据。

span.span: if, when determining if a dependency should be copied locally, one of the checks done is to see if the parent reference in the project file has the Private metadata set.

value.span: 如果设置了此元数据，则也会将其用于依赖项。

span.span: If that metadata is set, we will use that for the dependency as well.

value.span: 如果没有设置该元数据，则依赖项将通过与父引用相同的检查。

span.span: If the metadata is not set then the dependency will go through the same checks as the parent reference.

value.span: 其中一项检查是查看该引用是否位于 GAC 中。

span.span: One of these checks is to see if the reference is in the GAC.

value.span: 如果某个引用位于 GAC 中，则不会对该引用进行本地复制，因为它假定该引用也位于目标计算机上的 gac 中。

span.span: If a reference is in the GAC then we will not copy it locally as it is assumed it will be in the gac on the target machine as well.

value.span: 但是，这只适用于具体引用，而不适用于其依赖项。

span.span: However this only applies to that specific reference and not its dependencies.

value.span: 这意味着项目文件中的某个引用可能是复制本地 false，原因是该引用位于 GAC 中，但由于依赖项不在 GAC 中，因此可能仍然会对依赖项进行本地复制。

span.span: This means a reference in the project file may be copy local false due to it being in the GAC but the dependencies may still be copied locally because they are not in the GAC.

value.span: 这是 RAR 的默认行为，该行为会导致此属性的默认值为 true。

span.span: This is the default behavior for RAR and causes the default value for this property to be true.

value.span: 如果仍要检查项目文件引用，以确定它们是否位于 GAC 中，并根据需要设置其复制本地状态，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if we will still check project file references to see if they are in the GAC and set their copy local state as appropriate.

value.span: 但是，对于依赖项，我们不仅要检查它们是否位于 GAC 中，还要检查项目文件中的父引用是否位于 GAC 中。

span.span: However for dependencies we will not only check to see if they are in the GAC but we will also check to see if the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC.

value.span: 如果项目文件中的父引用位于 GAC 中，则不会对依赖项进行本地复制。

span.span: If the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC then we will not copy the dependency locally.

para.span: 如果存在多个父引用并且任何一个父引用都不来自 GAC，则会将复制本地设置为 true。

span.span: If there are multiple parent reference and ANY of them does not come from the GAC then we will set copy local to true.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个项列表，这些项表示包含配置文件的完全框架的 XML 文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of items representing XML files that contain the full framework for the profile.

value.span: 项的列表，这些项表示包含配置文件的完整框架的 XML 文件。

span.span: A list of items representing XML files that contain the full framework for the profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不会在此处传递任何内容，这适用于完整框架的 xml 文件的位置不在 RedistList 文件夹下的情况。Normally nothing is passed in here, this is for the cases where the location of the xml file for the full framework is not under a RedistList folder. 文件的格式如下所示：等。Format of the file is like: etc. ```xml // etc. ``` 此列表中的项必须指定 "FrameworkDirectory" 元数据以将可再发行列表与特定的框架目录关联。Items in this list must specify the "FrameworkDirectory" metadata to associate an redist list with a particular framework directory. 如果未进行关联，则将记录错误。If the association is not made an error will be logged. 原因在于，RAR 中的逻辑假设未设置 FrameworkDirectory，它将使用目标框架目录。The reason is, The logic in RAR assumes if a FrameworkDirectory is not set it will use the target framework directory.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ InstalledAssemblySubsetTables { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示 XML 文件列表的 ，这些 XML 文件包含应位于目标子集中的程序集。

span.span: Gets or sets an that represents a list of XML files that contain assemblies that are expected to be in the target subset.

value.span: XML 文件的列表。

span.span: A list of XML files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是文件的格式：This is the format of the file: ```xml etc. ``` 此列表中的项可以选择指定 "FrameworkDirectory" 元数据以将 InstalledAssemblySubsetTable 与特定的框架目录关联。Items in this list may optionally specify the "FrameworkDirectory" metadata to associate an InstalledAssemblySubsetTable with a particular framework directory. 如果只有一个 TargetFrameworkDirectories 元素，则将处理此列表中不包含 "FrameworkDirectory" 元数据的任何项，就像将元数据设置为传递到 TargetFrameworkDirectories 的单独（唯一）值一样。If there is only a single TargetFrameworkDirectories element, then any items in this list that do not have the "FrameworkDirectory" metadata will be treated as though the metadata is set to the lone (unique) value passed to TargetFrameworkDirectories.

span.span: If this is not set, then the highest framework installed on the machine for a given target framework identifier is searched and used.

span.span: The path to the target framework directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定生成的项的 `CopyLocal` 状态，则需要此属性。This property is required to determine the `CopyLocal` status for resulting items. 如果未指定此属性，则不会将生成的项的 `CopyLocal` 值 `true`，除非它们在其源项上显式具有 `Private` 元数据值 "`true`"。If this property is not specified, no resulting items will be have a `CopyLocal` value of `true` unless they explicitly have a `Private` metadata value of `true` on their source item.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于分析全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 引用的首选目标处理器体系结构，它可以具有 x86、IA64 或 AMD64 的值。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ WarnOrErrorOnTargetArchitectureMismatch { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，此值指定目标处理器架构和主引用架构之间不匹配时的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value specifying the behavior when a mismatch between the target processor architecture and the architecture of a primary reference.

summary.span: 如果它为“错误”，将为不匹配记录错误。

span.span: When this is "Error", an error will be logged for a mismatch.

summary.span: 如果它为“警告”，将为不匹配记录警告。

span.span: When this is "Warning", a warning will be logged for a mismatch.

summary.span: 如果它为“无”，不会为不匹配记录任何错误或警告。

span.span: When this is "None", no error or warning will be logged for a mismatch.

value.span: 字符串值为 "Error"、"Warning" 或 "None"。

span.span: A string value of "Error", "Warning" or "None".
